ygData.subject: Re: More on Hunting
ygData.msgSnippet: 16th is easy, hop on the boat and go to East Karana.  You can bind in either Rivervale or High Pass.  East Karana is a dream zone. at 16th lvl.  Nearly
ygData.messageBody:
16th is easy, hop on the boat and go to East Karana. You can bind in either
Rivervale or High Pass. East Karana is a dream zone. at 16th lvl. Nearly
everything there will be killable and give great exp, plus there are 2
vendor camps in the zone. Just watchout for the Cyclops, Hill Giants, Broon
and co, and the Griffon :)

Rokenn



>From: Mike.Langlois@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] More on Hunting

>
>
>
>Since we're on the subject...
>
>My group of around 16th lvl have just run out of steam cleaning up yard
>trash in
>Unrest. Loved our time there, much exp, very little dying, rapid respawn
>of
>lots of blues.
>
>Now what?
>
>The house is far too difficult for us, and we want to avoid crowds as much
>as
>possible...
>
>Golias, Bane of Death Beeltes Everywhere!
>
